Question
========

For a one-headed distribution skewed to the left, the mode is

Answerlist
----------

* Smaller than the median
* Greater than the mean
* Equal to the mean

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Less than the median: Incorrect
* Greater than the mean: Correct
* Equal to the mean: Incorrect
